full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### W0127-23P012 - LAUNDRY SERVICES - EDMONTON GARRISION

**Tender Reference:** WS4149999454-Doc4150161484

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** November 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date:** January 30, 2024
* **Contract End Date:** January 31, 2027

#### Service Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide laundry and dry cleaning services for the Edmonton Garrison, located north of Edmonton, Alberta. The services will include pickup and delivery of items, on an as and when requested basis, during the period of the Standing Offer.

#### Service Scope

* Supply of all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to provide regular laundry and dry cleaning services.
* Pickup and delivery of items, on an as and when requested basis.

#### Period of Service

The Standing Offer will be effective for three years (January 30, 2024, to January 31, 2027).

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Lorraine Jenkinson
* Contact Email: lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Document

The tender document is available on the Government of Canada's website through Ariba Discovery.

#### Note

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on December 11, 2023. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.AdapterManager
